    • Uses of ClusterTopology in io.hekate.cluster

      Methods in io.hekate.cluster that return ClusterTopology 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ClusterTopology ClusterTopology.filter(ClusterNodeFilter filter)
      Returns a copy of this topology containing only those nodes that match the specified filter.
      ClusterTopology ClusterTopology.filterAll(ClusterFilter filter)
      Returns a copy of this topology that contains only those nodes that match the specified filter.
      ClusterTopology ClusterTopologySupport.topology()
      Returns the cluster topology.
      ClusterTopology ClusterService.topology() 
      Methods in io.hekate.cluster that return types with arguments of type ClusterTopology 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CompletableFuture<ClusterTopology> ClusterService.futureOf(Predicate<ClusterTopology> predicate) 
      CompletableFuture<ClusterTopology> ClusterView.futureOf(Predicate<ClusterTopology> predicate)
      Returns a future object that will be completed once the cluster topology matches the specified predicate.
      Method parameters in io.hekate.cluster with type arguments of type ClusterTopology 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean ClusterView.awaitFor(Predicate<ClusterTopology> predicate)
      Awaits for this cluster view to match the specified predicate.
      boolean ClusterView.awaitFor(Predicate<ClusterTopology> predicate, long timeout, TimeUnit timeUnit)
      Awaits for this cluster view to match the specified predicate up to the specified timeout.
      CompletableFuture<ClusterTopology> ClusterService.futureOf(Predicate<ClusterTopology> predicate) 
      CompletableFuture<ClusterTopology> ClusterView.futureOf(Predicate<ClusterTopology> predicate)
